avSummary: sow 47, yielding 3, sower 2, bearing 1, conceive 1, seed 1, set 1
definition:
1) to sow, scatter seed
    1a) (Qal)
        1a1) to sow
        1a2) producing, yielding seed
    1b) (Niphal)
        1b1) to be sown
        1b2) to become pregnant, be made pregnant
    1c) (Pual) to be sown
    1d) (Hiphil) to produce seed, yield seed
